{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNR1000 |revision=v3 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/16/2009 |manuf_country=China, Vietnam |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12H139 |manuf_rev=.99 |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY309300117 |ic_id=4054A-09300117 |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5356A1;BCM5356A1KFBG, CA1005 P11, 959623 N1A; |cpu1_cspeed=333 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3205DM2I-12G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IC42S16800E-6TL |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, unpopulated,, 6-pin header,, (115200,8,N,1),, 3.3V TTL,, J3 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5356A1;BCM5356A1KFBG, CA1005 P11, 959623 N1A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=CFE;3.0.6;vendor modified; |stock_os=Linux;2.4.20; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=NETGEAR |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=20:4E:7F, 30:46:9A, 84:1B:5E, C0:3F:0E, E0:91:F5 |oui_eth=20:4E:7F, 30:46:9A, 84:1B:5E, C0:3F:0E, E0:91:F5 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-N 150 Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WNR1000v3|vs_id=12591}} "U12H139T99" and "Rev.0 GP" is silkscreened on the boards. :The same hardware is also used for the [[Netgear WGR614v10]]. OUIs may include 20:4E:7F, [http://git.chromium.org/gitweb/?p=chromiumos/third_party/autotest.git;a=blob;f=server/cros/chaos_static_ap_list.conf;h=96ffe88e6ec025cb32eabb71d13ca12b0b0feb39;hb=dcaefdda36ec9e3c281d70ccabb2ec900efce1a7 84:1B:5E OUI] ===Serial=== ====Pinout==== 
(GND) (TxD) (...) (...) (RxD) (+3.3v)
  o     o     o     o     o     o
  6     5     4     3     2     1
                       J3
